metadata.title: CVE-2024-53114 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  x86/CPU/AMD: Clear virtualized VMLOAD/VMSAVE on Zen4 client  A number of Zen4 client SoCs advertise the ability to use virtualized VMLOAD/VMSAVE, but using these instructions is reported to be a cause of a random host reboot.  These instructions aren't intended to be advertised on Zen4 client so clear the capability.
